website_summaries.verdict: A large-sized quality case that offers perks such as good cable management, a three-mode fan controller, and support for two 360-millimeter radiators.
pros: Includes two hard drive cages, each with three drive slots
Comes with dual 140-millimeter LED intake fans, a 140-millimeter exhaust fan, and a three-mode controller
cons: Some find the case to be too big
Reports of this option arriving with scuffs or broken
Side panels warp and bend easily

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this case. I have had it for nearly a year now, and have no qualms, or gripes with it. The build quality is excellent, and the design of it makes it extremely easy to access the internal components. It IS very large, though, so be prepared to put it into a spot where you won't need to move it very often. I, unfortunately, have to carry it two rooms over if I need to work on it, so if there is any hassle to this, that would be it, however, I see no reason to deduct any stars for that. An overall excellent product from Corsair, one of many, and I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave W Earle

customer_reviews.title: Aluminum foil & paint
customer_reviews.text: I am REALLY disappointed with this Corsair case. It is mostly plastic, does not have a completely tool less interior (the expansion port thumbscrews are set so far back you can't get as firm grip), and the side panels are so thin as to be likened to aluminum foil coated in paint. My CoolerMaster HAF 935 was very well built and I would never have replaced it had my idiot brother not dropped it while moving it to another location. Too bad I could't find another! If this is representative of Corsair's new line of cases, I'll have to say I'll NEVER by another case from them.
customer_reviews.author: JustAnotherSucker

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay together
customer_reviews.text: Given the price I expected more out of the case. While the assembly was fairly normal, as to be expected, and the size is what I wanted, the side panels of the case simple will not stay on, on either side. They clip in lightly but will not stay for long. If there's a secret trick here, I have not figured it out. I'm quite certain I have the correct alignment (because they will snap in just a little). I've had to hold the sides on with duck tape.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Olson

customer_reviews.title: Huge case
customer_reviews.text: This case is huge. Much bigger that I thought. Not a deal breaker. More than enough room to cram anything you want in it. The reason for the 4 stars is that the top and front mesh cover just seem too easy to come off when toughing them. I have read other reviews about the side doors, so far no issues with them. My unit came with a few of the USB ports on the case not working properly. They were loose. Contacted support and they mailed me a replacement part. Quite timely too. All in all a good case. It is huge, just keep that in mind
customer_reviews.author: Drewster

customer_reviews.title: A huge PC desktop case
customer_reviews.text: This is a toolless case that you don't need a screwdriver to open. It has plenty of space inside and more than enough drive bays, but the plastic bay tray releases aren't durable. Maybe I was unlucky that one of them broke, and Corsair doesn't stock replacement parts. It's a beast and will dominate your desktop. It should sit on the floor beside your desk. And once you assemble your PC it will be heavy, too.
customer_reviews.author: Rainys A. Blekaitis

customer_reviews.title: Corsair CC-9011063-WW Graphite Series 780T Full Tower PC Case - Black
customer_reviews.text: Its a decent pc case if you don't have a lot of stuff to put in case.360 rad will not fit on top.Comes with nice fans.Does not look like a full tower case but that's my opinion.This is a good starter pc case.I had a old motherboard Evga X58 classifed 3 in my closet collecting dust so i buy this case for that reason.Everything fit tight but case will do.
customer_reviews.author: Twinkie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tower!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tower. Tons of space! It is huge! Almost twice the size of my old asus desktop. Extra fan headers built into the wiring, highly recommend. I also had the same issues as others with a warped side panel, but Corsair customer support has been awesome. Little slow to answer at times, but they’re taking care of it. Will update if I get sent another warped panel though.
customer_reviews.author: Tenny Geldbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Really Strong case, Looks amazing.
customer_reviews.text: The case was extremely easy to use and get in and out of. I got tired of screw-on side plates real quick with my old case. I love the amount of space and cable management options it has compared to my last case which was practically a metal box with plates heavy enough to take off your toes haha. The only complaint I have is it's easy to scratch the display window on the side panel. It's a given since its some kinda polymer and not glass which would make this really heavy and also a lot more pricey. So I'm glad it's a light material but be careful about moving it so you don't scratch it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every pennies
customer_reviews.text: This tower is huge and so much room to work. I have another full tower and I thought it was big. I love the latch design for the 2 side panels because it is so easy to open and close compare to the other full tower. Also all the fan cover mesh are push to release, so no more opening screws to access the fans. The material quality is solid and yet seems to be lighter to lift then I thought. Overall, i am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Naga Speed

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case but beware of configuration issues with 360mm radiator
customer_reviews.text: Awesome huge case, but I bought to run my 360 mm radiators. Problem is I needed to 2 drive bays for my reservoir for the water system I have. In order to run the 2 360mm radiators you must remove the cage that the drives go in. So basically the drive slots are useless if you want to put a 360mm in. I had to buy 2 new 280mm to use the setup I have. But this is a excellent case, just very misleading in the configuration allowance ( or maybe was just me ). But I do highly recommend this case to any massive overclocker.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy access to all parts, lots of space and it looks good.
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned one of the side panels was bent a little right out of the box. However, once it is attached to the case you can’t tell unless you push on the top or bottom of the panel. Doesn’t bother me at all. There is sooo much room in this case. Cable management was very easy. Also as others have said, if you’re not into giant cases this may not be for you. It’s almost 2ft tall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect in every way, but...
customer_reviews.text: This case was everything i wanted, and i love it. however, my front usb 3.0 ports seem to be broken, which is a bummer. Its not a huge deal, since i have a usb 3.0 hub, but it kinda sucks knowing they dont work. Hopefully theres a way to repair/replace them
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Great Case, but flimsier material than versions that came before it.
customer_reviews.text: While still a solid case, its definitely noticeable that the overall part quality has dropped compared to previous versions of this case. That makes your newly built machine lighter, but still feels like a bit of a shame to me.
customer_reviews.author: Iggy

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tower a lot biggest one I’ve used lots of room..... that being said if you plan to use a 360mm radiator and fan setup (Corsair,evga) and you plan to use an optical drive you might have to mount your 3 mag lev fans above the radiator to pull through. I added to underneath to push up through
customer_reviews.author: nittany jason shields

customer_reviews.title: Great case. Top and front panels easily detach simply ...
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Top and front panels easily detach simply by pressing on them (spring loaded latch). Internal drive bays can be attached to the top or bottom of the case (I have mine attached to the top to allow 2 bottom fans to be installed). The drive sleds are made of a flexible plastic that allow drives to be mounted without screws, but some care should be taken to not overstress the sleds to the point that they break. Lots of room in the back for cable organizing. Bottom filters are easy to slide out for cleaning, and allow for a power supply to be mounted to draw air from the bottom instead of from the case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Steep price tag, but the value is there.
customer_reviews.text: Plastic drive bays should a thing of the past, I accidently broke one while taking out the mechanical hard drive I had. Other than that, the case is gigantic. Almost twice the size of my last case. I love the red and black asthetic. Everything worked, the case wasn't damaged, cable management was a dream, the fans are quiet and the fan control is a Godsend. Corsair did a good job on this one. I plan on keeping it for a while. I'm glad I have enough room now for liquid cooling and a good graphics card. This thing is gonna be beastly.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: High quality case, very solid. I have built many computer over the years and this is by far the best case I have owned. Everything is laid out perfectly for a new build. All the buttons are high quality to turn on\off and fan control. There are no cons to this case if your looking for a full tower with lots of room you found your case.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Probably overkill for whatever you're making, but lots of room to mount anything you want, good air flow with filters, and easy cable management
customer_reviews.author: clay hunter

customer_reviews.title: great case
customer_reviews.text: Lots of space. Deep area for cable management. Multiple mounting points for radiators/ fans (I have two 360mm radiators that fit very snug (make sure you research and double check before buying the radiators; thicker units won't fit on the inside because of the 5.25 bays and cant fit on top with the dust filter). Seems sturdy enough for what I need. There is some slight bending, but once you see that change your approach to moving it and really you don't really move it once it's hooked in. So far very pleased with this case.
customer_reviews.author: lees86

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: Absoutly love the case. Its massive and very spacious. The sides come off easily and go back on easily. You can put the largest water cooler in it that you can find. Cleaning is easy. Just press on the front or top and the screen pops right off.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S. Stroup

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, large, well built, great layout
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Everything fit into it nicely, parts went into place easily and without forcing things. All my components sat correctly in place, and the case is well built and has plenty of fans and room for more, as well as a good layout for parts like SSDs, SATA drives, etc. Very spacious as well, and good airflow. Overall, I am super happy with it. The case is HUGE though, so be warned. Easily enough clearance to put a Noctua NH-D15 cooler on top though and still close the case, even with putting the second fan on it and elevating it a few mm in order to clear the RAM.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Great case, has more than enough room for peripherals ...
customer_reviews.text: Great case, has more than enough room for peripherals and whatever else you wanna cram into it. Removable HD/SDD tray/holder is great for minimizing the amount of stuff blocking the front intake fans. Will probably be the last case anyone would need to buy, unless they want to build a second PC. Should be able to accommodate any new upgrades you wanna cram into it.
customer_reviews.author: William Ao

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Cables
customer_reviews.text: The USB 3 cable Very, Very poorly made. I unplugged it from the motherboard and the end stayed in the motherboard socket. So I would have to disassemble half the case to replace it. Not Good I can,t use the top USB 3 plugs. I won't buy another Corsair case ever!
customer_reviews.author: Laird Paul

customer_reviews.title: Its a huge case for a gaming computer with lots of space and easy access to all the components !
customer_reviews.text: If you are building a gaming computer, this a huge case that will provide a lot of space for Airflow and if you are installing a Noctua tower cooler for you CPU it will have headroom also. Outstanding Quality and Convenience, providing a rack for 6 HDD/SSD. Easy installation and a Fan Header for Multipule Fans. Removable Air Filter Screens for easy maintenance. Great Job CORSAIR!
customer_reviews.author: YAMIL DOMENECH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. It is HUGE. Easily could be the last case I will ever need to buy. It was very easy to build inside of and I love the clear window allowing me to see all the shiny new components I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: Great full tower
customer_reviews.text: This is the nicest full tower I have ever worked with. The space and wire management is top notch. If pairing with one of Corsairs liquid coolers you wont be disappointed. Also looks great with AMD Wraith cpu cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great airflow/cooling
customer_reviews.text: Removing the hard drive bays in front gives phenomenal air flow. Elevation, combined with air intakes on the bottom, means you can take advantage of natural convection. Comes with 3 fans. Cable management is great. The ability to stash 2.5 inch drives on the side is super handy. By far the best case Ive ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Woody Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great product highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My graphics card was running hot so i wanted a case with max airflow and that is what this is!! It is massive but the airflow and accessibility is amazing when cleaning and messing around inside
customer_reviews.author: Kainen

customer_reviews.title: This case is HUGE
customer_reviews.text: I was definitely under evaluating the size of this case, it's massive and so easy to build in. Pretty much a future proof case if you don't have to move it around a lot (pretty heavy) and if you want to add anything your heart desires. The fans have had no issues, and you can always change them out anyways!
customer_reviews.author: C L

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Case with so much spacs
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case with so much space to hold anything you could ever want. I love the red colors in the fans. Cabling made easy with this case!
customer_reviews.author: Tylertravels

customer_reviews.title: overall great case
customer_reviews.text: Pop off sides make for great ease of access. the pop off vent covers were a tad irritating popping out everytime i pressed against them but saved me loads of trouble mounting my liquid cooler. Great design and came with 3 fans preinstalled (2 red led on front) and lots of internal room. Lots of space for spare drives and special slots to slide excess cabling into. Only downside is the bottom vent covers slide out and if you aren't careful you'll drop it like i almost did.
customer_reviews.author: Jhon dafish

customer_reviews.title: By far the very best case. I love it
customer_reviews.text: By far the very best case. I love it!!! Many fan spots and keeps everything cool. I did Prime95 for over half an hour and highest was 72c but I have many fans. If anyone has questions please ask. I would recommend this case. I seriously don't know why pictures on Amazon are sideways?
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: CORSAIR Graphite 780T Full-Tower Case- Black
customer_reviews.text: This case was for a PC I was building for a friend. Nice case very roomy plenty of choices where to mount your water cooling equipment. Found the case very easy to work in.
customer_reviews.author: C. Oliveras

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing case with tons of space. It is massive! amazing look, great fan covers. If you can solder you can even pretty easily replace the leds on top for what ever color you want, I went purple. The plastic side is annoying, but you can get scratch remover, or even eventually replace if it is worth it for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Great except for the dust covers / vents are mounted to a mag latch like a cabinet door style closure. meaning that if you bump them, the spring loaded mechanism pops the entire thing open leaving all your glorious parts exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Miller

customer_reviews.title: This case is amazing! Lots of room for expansions and upgradability
customer_reviews.text: This case is amazing! Lots of room for expansions and upgradability. It also just looks really freaking cool. It is a huge case, as other people have mentioned, but it's that big for a reason. The only draw back is that I feel the plastic material is a bit... cheap feeling. Its no't unbearable though. Overall, I'm incredibly glad I got this case and am looking forward to growing my home lab with it.
customer_reviews.author: drumforfun19

customer_reviews.title: Very big, but very good.
customer_reviews.text: This case is huge, but it makes building and cable management that much easier. Looks great and leaves plenty of room for further expansion/ custom water cooling in the future. Plus the 3 140mm case fans push so much air that cooling will not be a problem for most builders.
customer_reviews.author: Logan M

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, just awesome. I was having some problems with the size of my Hyper 212 Evo, as well as some temp concerns with my old case and this fixed it all. It is HUGE! Which for me was a good thing. It has a lot of nifty features to make building easier such as, a self locking dvd cage, extra space in the back for wires, easy install ssd and hdd cages, and the easy remove plates on the back are a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME CASE!!! It is HUGE and is made with the upmost quality. One of the best cases I have ever bought. Highly recommend it for anyone who's looking for a new case. The clear window on the side gives it an extra cool look to it. I love being able to see the inside glow of my case and being able to easily access all of hardware for upgrades and cleaning. The extra large size is also amazing for airflow and has tons of room for fans and all the fans are easily accessible. Hands down the best and totally worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: A good case with a lot of space, but don't buy from Amazon Warehouse.
customer_reviews.text: As far as the case itself, it's very nice. Plenty of space and vent to keep things cool. I was however quite dissapaointed with the one I got from Amazon Warehouse, as rather than just a few bumps and scratches they had completely painted over the right panel window, and poorly at that. If your looking for a case with a solid build and an obscene amount of space for upgrades, I recommend this case. Just shell out the extra money for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Massive amazing case
customer_reviews.text: This case is massive. Easy to use with pop off fan covers and an easy to remove panel for access to cable management. I recommend for datahoarders, gamers, or those who want to show off this case if for you. It is large enough to store my drives and comes stock with enough fans for efficient air cooling.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hartzell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. It is a huge tower and makes ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It is a huge tower and makes for a perfect gaming PC. It's so spacious and sleek, but not as heavy a you would think. I have a mid-tower that weighted more than this full tower. The fact that the wires stay hidden is great and the ability to hold the biggest liquid cooling radiator is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Bermudez

customer_reviews.title: Buy it and never need a upgrade...
customer_reviews.text: By far, one of Corsair's best cases. It's big enough to put 3 systems in LOL. No, seriously it is huge....Get this case and you'll never need another. It was even designed with some BMW car designers input. :) Only con is, It's made of plastic and not metal. :( But ever thing else is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: David Lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Case
customer_reviews.text: This case is awesome. In addition to being aesthetically pleasing to the eyes, it is huge (Full ATX) and will fit most components with ease. Only thing I don't like with the case is the case front grill/dust filter, not sure how to clean dust from it, since the front grill is metal and the dust filter can only be removed by bending out the metal grills which I don't want to do in case i break it, i can't wash it without risking it rusting. I have used electric duster on it but it does not remove all the dust properly. Other than that I have no other complaints about the case, definitely worth buying
customer_reviews.author: Darryl H

customer_reviews.title: good quality and safe
customer_reviews.text: nice and good quality products, but I did not even do that much money with too maaliyetl duty to my country somehow . robust and made ​​from quality materials , but also foot part of the metal would be very nice if a little plastic stands sayif . I would love to be gold-plated audio inputs . I'd recommend Amazon officials so good I had satisfied my love (Sorry for bad english i am using google translation )
customer_reviews.author: MURAT

customer_reviews.title: Great case but arrived somewhat dead
customer_reviews.text: The case is great, but it came in with 3 USB ports not working, and the reset button also doesn't work. Not possitive if the headphone and Microphone jack works.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett J.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case. Plenty of room to route cables through ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent case. Plenty of room to route cables through the back for a very clean inside build. This thing is huge but if that's what you want it's perfect. I have a Corsair Hydro Series H115i mounted on the top. 5 Hard drives. Runs quite and cool. I really don't care about the side panel window, but with all the room to assemble and route cables it looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Christian P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent room for whatever you want to build.
customer_reviews.text: Hard drive cages could be more substantial. Other than that, I really nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Dean E. Hinson

customer_reviews.title: Great case! Way more spacious than I anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Great case! Way more spacious than I anticipated. The tool free installation for the drives had me nervous at first but honestly they're pretty sturdy and easy to access. My only complaint is there isn't much space to run your fan cables down from the top.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great sleek modern case
customer_reviews.text: Great sleek modern case. Alot of room for cable management. Plenty of room for liquid cooling and expanding. Did I mention it looks amazing. Throw in some lights to really brighten it up. Couldn't have asked for a better case. Could have possibly put in a side intake fan. Not a big issue though, I haven't seen any issues with heat. Plus a fan would have ruined some of the style.
customer_reviews.author: Joey K

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room and easy access to devices. Cable management for case is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a case with Plenty of room for whatever you want . I love it !! Its a really big case so keep that in mind . For me its perfect I have big hands and trying to work in the smaller cases has always been a pain , But now Problem solved !!
customer_reviews.author: mark a maggard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case!
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of air movement, plenty of storage space, plenty of space for radiators!!! Very happy with this case, also talked my friend into getting one. Please note, it is a full size case..
customer_reviews.author: Fred Guerr

customer_reviews.title: Bad headphone jack
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but I've only had this for a year and the headphone jack already went out. Poor quality internals that come with the case.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Spence

customer_reviews.title: Corsair because no one compares!
customer_reviews.text: Corsair for quality, appeal and reliability. My go to for peripherals!
customer_reviews.author: Chris L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case, Has A lot of cable management space
customer_reviews.text: Awesome case, Has A lot of cable management space, Has good about of HHD and SSD Drive storage, Very easy to put stuff in the case. Every just clips on. Easy Cleaning. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph miller

customer_reviews.title: I really like the 3 speed fan switch and USB 2
customer_reviews.text: Very large and stylish. Should fit everything you may want to install. Tool-less drive cages for six 3.5" conventional drives and three 2.5" SSDs/HDs. I really like the 3 speed fan switch and USB 2.0/3.0 ports on the top of the case.
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: Best case ever
customer_reviews.text: This case is really awesome solid metal lighting is in best spot. So when you put it to sleep no flashing light to bother you when you try to sleep. Plenty of room for other part upgrades when they get bigger! Love where the controles are all located ontop! Its perfect for cable management with either having all yourinthe front so you can see all of it or through the back nice and neat. I think this is corsairs best pc case always loved corsair for there liquid cooling, keybaords and mouse and headset! Better than razer in my own opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Haruto

customer_reviews.title: Solid Case
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid full tower case. Zero issues getting all my components in and working. Lots of nifty features like SSD (no screw) cages, plenty of rooms for drives, and plenty of space to maneuver. All in all very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Just know... it’s HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is HUGE! It easily fit all the components I bought for my PC build. It’s easy to work with, comes with tons of cables, and has a optical drive port so I can load my old pc games. But it is HUGE!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: I opened it up the 1st day it came and was satisfied with the build quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case back in 2015-2015 and its still in the box, I opened it up the 1st day it came and was satisfied with the build quality, material and extra large size. This case will make any PC builders parts to justice with its air flow capabilities. When I'm able to complete my build when gpu prices drop I will do a update to my review to further the details on performance and airflow. Pros - Huge, Black and Sexy... I love it... Cons - None so far...
customer_reviews.author: Photo Don Corleone

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case. Used it for my first build and ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome case. Used it for my first build and I love it. Plenty of room for my rookie wire management and very good airflow. I did have to fix some cables because the non-windowed door popped off from having pressure on it from the inside. But when your only complaint is caused by yourself and not the product, there's no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: The case is straight up beautiful. Corsair made it really easy to route cables ...
customer_reviews.text: The case is straight up beautiful. Corsair made it really easy to route cables -- I do datacenter infrastructure all day and I was surprised at how nice I was able to make it look without all that much effort. Seriously a great case and just look at it - style and function right here.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M

customer_reviews.title: HUGE
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice case, I used it for my latest build but it is HUGE, not Big. HUGE
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Thomas

customer_reviews.title: This refresh makes an already solid build even better. Front panel looks and feels better
customer_reviews.text: I've used this series for my friends build. This refresh makes an already solid build even better. Front panel looks and feels better. I only knock it 1 star because of the drive cages. They are not very friendly to work with. The screw inserts kept popping out when I was trying to get the drives in. Other wise, the build was very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: and sturdy. I love the rubber feet
customer_reviews.text: huge, spacious, and sturdy. I love the rubber feet, and the side-facing drive bays. it's​ a tool-less design and it achieves that without sacrificing quality. oh, did I mention its big? if you really want to get indepth check out new eggs review on it.
customer_reviews.author: Part49

customer_reviews.title: An absolute dream to build in.
customer_reviews.text: Moved my system from a Fractal Design Arc Midi R2, which is a solid case in its own right, but was coming up on 3 years of having it and starting to fall apart, so decided to get something new. The 780T, as my review title states, is an absolute dream to build in, so much room for activities!! (LOL). Plenty of room behind the motherboard to route and tuck away any cable you'd need to, and plenty of cable tie mounts as most Corsair cases do.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Really good PC case
customer_reviews.text: Really Well built case easy to install. lots of space for cable management.
customer_reviews.author: Makaveli Soto

customer_reviews.title: This is a excellent case!
customer_reviews.text: This is a excellent case!! Plenty of room and features, while it is big it is easy to work with and looks sleek and sexy. Well built and well worth the asking price.
customer_reviews.author: G. Morris

customer_reviews.title: A dream to build in.
customer_reviews.text: I Abslolutely LOVE this case, I have been pondering what case to get for my personal rig when I finally had enough money to build it. I decided on this one because it's sexy as hell and because there is a lot of room. I have big hands so that extra room is necessary for me. Only wish there was a little more steel in the construction, but since I don't plan to move it often, that really isn't a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Malone

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case but this thing is absolutely massive so make sure you know what you’re buying. I ended up returning it for a smaller sized case.
customer_reviews.author: Stan King

customer_reviews.title: Great case for the price, plenty of room and great for keeping components running cool!
customer_reviews.text: So much room! I had no problem with my build and enjoyed the ease and spacious room this case offers. Plenty of room for a nice liquid cooler with 280mm radiator, I was able to install 4 fans in a push/pull setup with no problem. 7 other fans installed around the case make this run very cool. For the price I would recommend this case to anyone wanting an affordable high quality case that adds a great look to your build.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Riffey

customer_reviews.title: This is the best case I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is the best case I have ever bought.... I was waiting for it to come out in yellow but after my side panel on my CM Cosmos failed on me I had to buy this in black.... Cable Management is well thought out,,,,,, acoustics and heat are way better than my old HAF and Cosmos cases..... the best part is obviously it looks like a supercar speeding down the highway.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case, great airflow all around
customer_reviews.text: Awesome case, great airflow all around.. tons of space, tons of room for HD's/SSD's/GPU's/Fan's/Radiators.. Highly recommend any of the Graphite series cases, 760T is awesome too, I use both the 760T and 780T in my Personal PC and my Server.
customer_reviews.author: Jax_-

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, beautiful, beautiful. Looks good with the case light on. Easy to install everything and lots of cable management gommets.
customer_reviews.author: sstar70

customer_reviews.title: Full case for sure.
customer_reviews.text: Case was everything I expected. It is a solid unit and held everything I threw at it.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Best case ever
customer_reviews.text: First pic build ever. All black and red build. Two front fans red. The one in back is black. A lot of space and room for wiring. It's huge case lots of room to work inside. Like the clear plastic on the side. After finishing build, the PC is pretty heavy.
customer_reviews.author: GummyBears :D

customer_reviews.title: Corsais produces yet another great product
customer_reviews.text: Can tell you how great this tower is. It looks great, plenty of room inside, no sharp edges, easy cable management. My only complaint would be it could use a little more room in the back for easier cable management.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tower it was very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tower it was very easy to install, i did have one complaint my Case had a warped side that would not latch, hopefully corsair will send me a replacement still rating this case 5 stars.

customer_reviews.title: Great case overall
customer_reviews.text: Great case, with tons of space. Just wish it didn’t have a cd drive bay or that it was easier to take out.

customer_reviews.title: great giant tower
customer_reviews.text: great giant tower. install is so ezy. including fans are 2x140 font, 1x140 up, 1x140 back. you can have 1~2(x120~200) more for up, and 2x120 for bottom. side cabling is nice.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: only reason it isn't five star is that the front and top covers arent flush to the chassis

customer_reviews.text: Overall solid case. Not a huge fan of the positioning of the 2.5 hd slots. Very easy to open and close.

customer_reviews.text: Quite, big modular case easy to access inside supper easy to clean

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room for the biggest build!
customer_reviews.text: Great case with plenty of room to fit all those great parts for a high end gaming machine. Appreciate the configuration and openness of the design.

customer_reviews.title: Omg this thing is huge.....
customer_reviews.text: This is one big case. After everything is installed still has lots of room.

customer_reviews.title: Almost everything about this product is perfect
customer_reviews.text: The one issue I would have is that the power button on top shuts the computer down instantly without even asking if you're sure

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.text: This case is absolutely amazing to look at, easy to work in for any build, and it stays very cool inside, to my standards.

customer_reviews.title: This case has roooom and more rooooom. My first ...
customer_reviews.text: This case has roooom and more rooooom. My first MB was a EATX and it fit with no problem and I had room to spare. 2 thumbs way up
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Corsair Graphite 780T A Must Have for the serious Gaming PC build.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome case! Extremely well built a lot of room inside even for the most demanding builds. As you can see from my picture I have a Noctua NH-D15 heat sink in mine which is considered one the largest. Rigid, easy access. My first choice.
customer_reviews.author: SERGE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best computer case I have owned, 3 months so far everything is good.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Gardner

customer_reviews.title: the best computer related purchase I have ever made
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, the best computer related purchase I have ever made. They got this one near perfect and 5 stars simply doesn't do it justice. Owning one - I wouldn't hesitate to spend a premium up to $250 were it necessary to acquire another. The details...well, you should research this one. Huge by any standard, with considerable interior spacing and room for lots of fans. Plenty of room for my twin GTX 970's to breathe. Overall dropped my heated in-game temps down more than 8 degrees Celsius. Seriously, Corsair thought of everything in this design. ...And I am still looking for the cup holders I just know are around here somewhere. Peace.
customer_reviews.author: Whit

customer_reviews.title: Amazing case.
customer_reviews.text: Big case with lots of room for big hands. You can build some amazing computers in this case, 10/10 would recommend to all my friends and PC enthusiasts.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Speights

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Plenty of room; This thing dwarfs the inner hardware which is great because it means I can upgrade those parts without having to buy another case. It's very simple to work with and made building my machine a walk in the park. Cons: Now I want to buy more parts to fill this behemoth. Well done Corsair!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Fantastics Tower wood recommend
customer_reviews.text: Item has everything I wanted and the space to go with it. be prepared for it to The dwarf anything inside and make sure you have the space for it.

customer_reviews.text: Nice case. User friendly design. The one thing that feels lacking in quality is the internal HDD holders. They are plastic and flimsy, but not terrible.

customer_reviews.text: Love this case for 2 main facts looks and size. Had i for 30 months now and no problems just perfect and I get a lot of complements on it.

product_meta.title: Corsair CC-9011063-WW Graphite Series 780T Full Tower PC Case - Black
product_meta.description: A nicely-built high performance PC can be a thing of beauty. This is truer than ever with the sleek, artfully crafted, and undeniably stunning Graphite Series 780T. The striking Graphite Series 780T full tower PC case is the perfect place for your high-end PC parts and delivers a knockout when it comes to performance capabilities and ease of maintenance. Evade the aesthetics of yesteryear with 780T's rounded corners and smart design principles inside and out. A windowed side panel reveals incredible expansion and layout options, including space for dual 360mm radiators or up to nine 120mm fans. With room for nine drives thanks to the modular tool-free hard drive cages and side-mounted SSD bays, you'll have tons of storage flexibility. The front panel offers a lot of functionality, too: a three-mode fan controller makes you the judge of optimal noise and cooling ratios, and there are two ports each for USB 3.0 and 2.0 devices, as well as headphone and microphone ports.
feature_bullets: Rounded corners and a sleek, cohesive design for great-looking systems
Latched side panels for easy access. Case Windowed : Acrylic
Supports dual 360mm radiators for state-of-the-art cooling installations. Compatible Corsair Liquid Coolers: H55, H60, H75, H80i, H90, H100i, H105, H110
Front panel three-mode fan controller lets you tailor performance and fan noise
Dual 140mm LED intake fans and a 140mm exhaust fan for ample airflow
Six Modular hard drive cages and three space-saving side-mounted SSD bays for smart storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars628 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
